review: Dr. Kriti Bhatia is an exceptional dentist who truly cares about her patients' oral health and overall well-being. Her expertise, professionalism, and gentle demeanor make every visit to her clinic a pleasant experience. Dr. Kriti takes the time to listen to her patients' concerns and explains treatment options thoroughly, ensuring they feel comfortable and informed. With her skilled hands and state-of-the-art equipment, she delivers outstanding results. I highly recommend Dr. Kriti Bhatia to anyone in search of top-notch dental care.

Doctor provided an outstanding experience from start to finish. The staff was welcoming, and the office was spotless. Dr. Kriti was incredibly attentive, explaining everything clearly and addressing all my concerns. I felt genuinely cared for and left with complete confidence in my treatment. Highly recommend!

Visited Apollo Clinic for dental work and was pleasantly surprised by the exceptional service. 
The staff were incredibly helpful. 
Not only was the treatment very affordable, but the facilities were also top notch. 
I highly recommend Apollo Clinic and Dr. Kriti for anyone seeking quality dental treatment

Dr. Kriti is an absolute professional who takes pride in her work. She recently performed a complex dental procedure for me, and I am thoroughly impressed with the results. Her expertise and compassionate approach make her stand out among other dentists.
